005package edu.wpi.first.networktables;
006
007/** NetworkTables Connection notification. */
008@SuppressWarnings("MemberName")
009public final class ConnectionNotification extends NotificationBase {
010  /** True if event is due to connection being established. */
011  public final boolean connected;
012
013  /** Connection information. */
014  public final ConnectionInfo conn;
015
016  /**
017   * Constructor. This should generally only be used internally to NetworkTables.
018   *
019   * @param inst Instance
020   * @param listener Listener that was triggered
021   * @param connected Connected if true
022   * @param conn Connection information
023   */
024  public ConnectionNotification(
025      NetworkTableInstance inst, int listener, boolean connected, ConnectionInfo conn) {
026    super(inst, listener);
027    this.connected = connected;
028    this.conn = conn;
029  }
030}
